text: Passing multiple values to a function call (Python)

code:
import re
def strip_tags(value):
    "Return the given HTML with all tags stripped."
    return re.sub(r'<[^>]*?>', '', value)

text: I have this function to strip HTML tags, but it seems to accept only single value, what do I need to change if I want to pass multiple (not fixed) values at once?
